full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 202 of 236 1106 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 Q. So that's the floor plan of the first floor of Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach residence; isn't that right? 2 A. It is, sir. 3 Q. Do you see over on the left-hand side of the floor plan, there is a room labeled "kitchen?" 4 A. I do, sir. 5 Q. If you would draw a line straight down to the bottom of the floor plan from the kitchen, you hit a room that is labeled "staff," is that right? 6 A. True. 7 MR. EVERDELL: I believe, if we can call up now maybe next to this what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 238. I don't believe that's under seal. 8 MS. COMEY: It's not under seal, your Honor. 9 THE COURT: All right. You can publish 238. 10 MR. EVERDELL: Thank you, your Honor. 11 Q. Mr. Parkinson, do you see 238 next to the floor plan, 298? 12 A. I do, sir. 13 Q. So is that what's depicted in Government Exhibit 238, is that the staff room that is labeled in the floor plan as "staff?" 14 A. It is. 15 Q. So it appears to be a little office; is that right? 16 A. True. 17 MR. EVERDELL: If we can take down 238 but keep up 18 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012716
